metadata.Title: CVE-2014-7145 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description:
The SMB2_tcon function in fs/cifs/smb2pdu.c in the Linux kernel before3.16.3 allows remote CIFS servers to cause a denial of service (NULLpointer dereference and client system crash) or possibly have unspecifiedother impact by deleting the IPC$ share during resolution of DFS referrals.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2014-7145` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-3.13.0-173-generic - 3.13.0-39.66
linux-image-3.13.0-173-generic-lpae - 3.13.0-39.66
linux-image-3.13.0-173-lowlatency - 3.13.0-39.66
linux-image-3.13.0-173-powerpc-e500 - 3.13.0-39.66
linux-image-3.13.0-173-powerpc-e500mc - 3.13.0-39.66
linux-image-3.13.0-173-powerpc-smp - 3.13.0-39.66
linux-image-3.13.0-173-powerpc64-emb - 3.13.0-39.66
linux-image-3.13.0-173-powerpc64-smp - 3.13.0-39.66
linux-image-unsigned-3.13.0-173-generic - 3.13.0-39.66
linux-image-unsigned-3.13.0-173-lowlatency - 3.13.0-39.66
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-3.16.0-25-generic - 3.16.0-25.33~14.04.2
linux-image-3.16.0-25-generic-lpae - 3.16.0-25.33~14.04.2
linux-image-3.16.0-25-lowlatency - 3.16.0-25.33~14.04.2
linux-image-3.16.0-25-powerpc-e500mc - 3.16.0-25.33~14.04.2
linux-image-3.16.0-25-powerpc-smp - 3.16.0-25.33~14.04.2
linux-image-3.16.0-25-powerpc64-emb - 3.16.0-25.33~14.04.2
linux-image-3.16.0-25-powerpc64-smp - 3.16.0-25.33~14.04.2
linux-image-extra-3.16.0-25-generic - 3.16.0-25.33~14.04.2
No subscription required

linux-image-3.19.0-18-generic - 3.19.0-18.18~14.04.1
linux-image-3.19.0-18-generic-lpae - 3.19.0-18.18~14.04.1
linux-image-3.19.0-18-lowlatency - 3.19.0-18.18~14.04.1
linux-image-3.19.0-18-powerpc-e500mc - 3.19.0-18.18~14.04.1
linux-image-3.19.0-18-powerpc-smp - 3.19.0-18.18~14.04.1
linux-image-3.19.0-18-powerpc64-emb - 3.19.0-18.18~14.04.1

No subscription required

criterions.comment: linux package in trusty/esm was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '3.13.0-39.66').
linux-goldfish: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
linux-grouper: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.

linux-lts-utopic package in trusty, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.16.0-25.33~14.04.2').
linux-lts-vivid package in trusty, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.19.0-18.18~14.04.1').
